hero.subTitle: Effortless conversion between i18n JSON files and Excel for Angular and modern web projects.
hero.title: Revolutionize Your i18n translations with AI

features.title: with powerful features
features.description: Everything you need to manage internationalization in your projects

biDirectional.title: Bi-Directional Conversion
biDirectional.description: Convert i18n JSON files to Excel and vice versa seamlessly.

nestedSupport.title: Nested Key Support
nestedSupport.description: Handles deeply nested translation structures with dot-notation flattening.

languageMapping.title: Language Mapping
languageMapping.description: Use full language names in Excel headers (e.g., 'German' instead of 'de').

validation.title: Validation
validation.description: Detect inconsistent placeholders and duplicate translation keys.

missingKeyDetection.title: Missing Key Detection
missingKeyDetection.description: Find translation keys used in code but missing from JSON files.

unusedKeyDetection.title: Unused Key Detection
unusedKeyDetection.description: Identify translation keys defined in JSON but never used in code.

geminiIntegration.title: Gemini Integration
geminiIntegration.description: Auto-translate missing values using Google's Gemini AI models.

interactiveCli.title: Interactive CLI
interactiveCli.description: User-friendly menu-driven interface for all operations.

dryRunMode.title: Dry-Run Mode
dryRunMode.description: Preview changes without writing files. Safe path validation included.

codeSection.title: and simple to use
codeSection.description: Get started with a single command or integrate programmatically

aiSection.title: Automatic Translation with Gemini AI
aiSection.description: Never manually translate again. Our Gemini integration automatically fills in missing translations while preserving your placeholders and formatting.

perks.automaticTranslations: Auto-translate missing values with Gemini AI

gettingStarted.title: Get started in seconds
gettingStarted.description: Install via npm and run a single command to convert your i18n JSON files to Excel or vice versa.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Answers to common questions about i18n-Excel-Manager

formatsSupported.a: The tool supports converting between i18n JSON files and Excel (XLSX) format. It's optimized for modern web projects and works seamlessly with Angular applications.

nestedKeys.q: Does it support nested translation keys?
nestedKeys.a: Yes, absolutely. Nested objects are automatically flattened into dot-notation when exporting to Excel (e.g., 'header.title') and restored back to the original nested structure when importing from Excel to JSON.

aiTranslation.a: The tool integrates with Google's Gemini AI to automatically translate missing values while preserving placeholders like {{name}}, HTML tags, and your original formatting. You can choose which Gemini model to use for translations.

dryRun.q: Is there a safe way to preview changes before applying them?
dryRun.a: Yes. The dry-run mode lets you preview all changes without modifying any files. It includes path validation to prevent accidental overwrites and shows you exactly what would be created or modified.

angularIntegration.q: How do I integrate this tool with my Angular project?
angularIntegration.a: You can use it via the interactive CLI in your project directory, or integrate it programmatically in your build process. The tool works with the standard i18n structure (e.g., public/assets/i18n or src/assets/i18n).

geminiApiKey.q: Do I need a Gemini API key for AI auto-translation?
geminiApiKey.a: Yes, you need a Gemini API key to use the AI auto-translation feature. You can obtain a free API key from Google AI Studio at https://makersuite.google.com/app/api-key.

testedVersions.q: Which versions of Angular and ngx-translate are supported?
testedVersions.a: The tool has been tested and works seamlessly with Angular version 20+ and ngx-translate v17+. While it may work with earlier versions, these are the officially tested and supported versions.
